p: Adaptive immune functions were mostly enriched in the comparisons of lung tissue without lesion: in group 4 –T cell activation, groups 5 and 6 –T cell co-stimulation, group 2 –Th2 cytokine production and group 5 –regulation of lymphocyte migration. The only function that was enriched in lung tissue lesions (in groups 2 and 6) was T cell activation.
